metadata.title: Savlo — Simple, Secure Financing for Small Businesses
metadata.description: Savlo connects small businesses to trusted financing partners. Quick applications, clear terms, and dashboard tracking. Start with 14-day free access.

hero.headline: Unlock Financing That Actually Fits Your Business
hero.subtext: Savlo connects your business to verified lenders and financing products — fast, clear, and secure.
hero.description: Apply online and track progress from your own dashboard.

howItWorks.heading: How Savlo Works — 3 simple steps

steps.title: Tell us about your need.
steps.description: Pick BPKB, property, AP, or AR financing.

steps.title: Upload your documents.
steps.description: Secure uploads, one place to manage files.

steps.title: Track progress.
steps.description: Follow each application from submission to payout.

howItWorks.microcopy: No hidden fees. No guesswork. Real updates in your dashboard.

products.heading: Products built for real business needs

items.title: BPKB Financing
items.description: Quick loans secured by vehicle ownership (BPKB). Fast turnaround for urgent cash needs.

items.title: Property Financing
items.description: Access up to 65% of your property value (max IDR 5B). Clear terms, straightforward steps.

items.title: AP Invoice Financing
items.description: Finance payables to keep suppliers paid — up to IDR 2B. Short application, quick payout.

items.title: AR Invoice Financing
items.description: Convert receivables into working capital — up to IDR 5B. Smooth approvals for qualified invoices.

items.title: Savlo+ (Ecosystem Program)
items.description: For businesses that need a custom approach — priority access and personalized support.

whyChooseSavlo.heading: Why businesses choose Savlo
items: Verified funding partners and clear fees.
Apply online, track everything in one place.
Local support that answers real questions.
Security and privacy first — your documents are protected.

pricing.heading: Choose a plan that fits you
pricing.subtext: Start with Savlo gateway for free consultations. Upgrade to Savlo+ for tailored solutions.

trust.heading: Trusted by financial partners
trust.microcopy: We work with regulated multi-finance institutions and fintech partners. (Add logos after launch.)

services.heading: Financing Solutions Tailored for You
services.subtext: Discover various financing solutions from our trusted partners — designed for your business, personal, and operational needs.

products.title: BPKB-based Financing
products.description: Use your vehicle's BPKB as collateral to get quick funding.
products.benefit: Easy process and suitable for urgent needs.

products.title: Property-based Financing
products.benefit: Funding value up to 65% of property value, maximum IDR 5 Billion.

products.title: AP Invoice Financing
products.description: Finance accounts payable invoices up to IDR 2 Billion.
products.benefit: Help smooth supplier payments and your business cash flow.

products.title: AR Invoice Financing
products.description: Optimize working capital by financing accounts receivable up to IDR 5 Billion.
products.benefit: Accelerate cash flow without disrupting operations.

products.title: Ecosystem Banking Solutions
products.description: Special solutions for businesses that have difficulty meeting conventional financing eligibility standards.
products.benefit: Designed to provide more flexible solutions.

choosePlan.heading: Choose the Right Plan for Your Business
choosePlan.subtext: Compare Savlo's free gateway service with Savlo+'s premium ecosystem program.
